ability.Dauntless Shield: On switch-in, this Pokemon's Defense is raised by 1 stage.
ability.Shield Bash: Each time this Pokemon's defense stat increases by 1, it recovers 1/10 of its maximum HP.

Play Rough.effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.

Iron Defense.effect: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.

Body Press.effect: Damage is calculated using the user's Defense stat as its Attack, including stat stage changes.

Rest.effect: The user falls asleep and restores all of its HP, curing itself of any non-volatile status in the process. Fails if the user has full HP, or is already asleep.
